name: Artificial Stupidity
description:
You and a robot have been taken in for an interview. The aim of the test is to determine which of you is the artificial intelligence. They're looking for a hyper-intelligent robot - the catch? The AI is actually incredibly stupid.

A game about trying to out-dumb an artificial intelligence.

Desktop version is recommended to reduce lag.

--- Credits ---
